name: ENERGOCHEMICA TRADING a.s.
goal: ENERGOCHEMICA TRADING a.s. is a subsidiary of ENERGOCHEMICA SE. The holding’s core comprises chemical factories with a long tradition and heavy emphasis on product quality, environmental protection and occupational safety.  The holding consists of several production and sales companies and an R&D institute. Energy production forms an inseparable part of the chemical production, making its chemical processes fully energy self-sufficient and also providing energy to external users.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Mainly regulatory processes concernig energy, chemistry, REACH, climate change, transport, innovations, bioeconomy and biofuels, renewable energies, environmental policy, forest policy, circular economy, waste and recycling policies, innovation policy, trade policy
